id_comment: The Plugin ID thats installed in PowerSchool
secret_comment: The Plugin Secret thats installed in PowerSchool
url_comment: The URL of your PowerSchool instance, without any paths.
schoolArray_comment: A numaric array of the school ID's that should be accessed.
namedSchoolArray_comment: A text array of Human Readable school names, corresponding in order to the School ID's before it.
